email_subject: Check out the new CLIE PEG-T665C from Sony! (CNET SHOPPER)
email_body: The body of the email is in HTML format and contains promotional content for various products such as the Sony CLIE PEG-T665C, Palm m130, Palm m515, Palm i705, Sony CLIE PEG-T615C, Toshiba Pocket PC e310, Compaq iPaq H3835, Sony CLIE PEG-NR70V, and Compaq iPaq H3870. It also includes special features, links to different sections of the CNET website, and subscription management options.
